revised_title: Unimolecular Film Rigidity: Palmitic and Stearic Acids
tldr: The authors studied the rigidity of solid unimolecular films made of palmitic and stearic acids on water. They found that the rigidity constants for both acids are almost identical, at 0.3 dynes per cm² at 0°C. The temperature coefficients of the rigidities were also measured and shown to be similar to those of solids.
